text: The England men's national under-16 basketball team is a national basketball team of England, administered by the Basketball England. It represents the country in men's international under-16 basketball competitions. The team participated 5 times at the FIBA U16 European Championship Division A: in 1973,1973 European Championship for Cadets results, FIBA archive 1975,1975 European Championship for Cadets results, FIBA archive 1995,1995 European Championship for Cadets results, FIBA archive 2012,2012 U16 European Championship for Men results, FIBA archive and 2015.2015 U16 European Championship for Men results, FIBA archive They also won four medals at the FIBA U16 European Championship Division B. ==See also== *England men's national basketball team *England men's national under-18 basketball team *England women's national under-16 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Archived records of England team participations Category:Basketball in England Category:National under-16 basketball teams Basketball
title: England men's national under-16 basketball team
